# Peculiar

The peculiar P⇔K connection of PIE is well attested through the Indus association of
𓆣 𓐍𓊪𓂋𓂋 Käfer with the abstract letter kappa:
𜐳 𜐲 𜐶 𜐵 k vs 𜐻 p b beetle in Elamite :
𜛺 𜛾 𜦮 𜦭 𜦳 𜦴 ⇔ 𜐳 perfect continuum, supported by many side forms.

PIE had a peculiar yet almost ubiquitous sound-change between

K < q:=kʷ > P

TC 𐀤 QE quatro CE tetra

CP cinque penj 5

𓄙 CRY/PHR

GB
QV quod > what OK

ч < q < Ϥ 𓆑 qv > Ϥ व v
ч 𐡊 kappa cobra 𓆑 kur
ч ⋍ 4 quattro θετρα / four

𔔤 ≠ 𔗟 •pou ≠ kou
𓊪 ≠ 口 •pou ≠ kou
𓊪 ≠ 𒆪 •pou ≠ kou
𔔣 ≠ 𔗟 •pou ≠ kou

𒆪𒌦𒉪 ku-un-nir :
𒆪𒌦𒉪 •pu-un-nir փանջարա pʿanǰara پنجره panjere پنجره pencere ⇔ पिञ्जर piñjara fenster window

𐀂 peculiar ᵍᵠ / ᵠᵍ

confusion between K/P often lead to ø deletion

𒄿 "I"
𒄿 •kwiᵒⁿ
𒄿 quint/pent 5

𒄿𒋾 ʷi-ti /īti, īdi/ wade walk ⇔ evade
𒄿𒋾 ᶢi-ti /īti, īdi/ goeth "to go" vs come

𒄿 pent => 𒄿𒋫𒋾 plant phyte pi-ta-ti (eat potato;)
𒄿 bander 𓊹𓇼 > 𓇋

𒄿 fi = OF

𓁸 Peculiar Bi/Gi change:

𒄑𒉈𒂵𒈩 Bilgameš Bil2-ga-meš3 𒄑𒂆𒈦 Gilgameš

Great Examples

## wolf
Greek: λύκος lúkos "Licht" wolf
PIE: *wĺ̥kʷos peculiar wĺ̥kʷ => wĺ̥p Welpe wolf
Luwian: 𒌑𒇷𒅁𒉌𒅖 /úlipnis/ wolf
Latin: lupus wolf
Sumerian: 𒈜 LUB lupo wolf
Sumerian: 𒈜 LIK λύκος lúkos wolf

𓅱 pollo pollino pollito 🐥 🐣 who
🐔 gallo 🐤 gallina peculiar que

𒍝𒀊𒉼 za-ap-pan Zwang ζυγόν zugón "yoke" Zügel

The variation of the initial consonant between
Θ (Th) and Φ (Ph) in different dialects is the reason for reconstructing a labiovelar *kʷʰ.

bread
𒅆 𒅁𒊒𒌝 ši-ip-ru-um Zubrot
𒅆𒅁𒊑𒌝 ši-ip-ri-um ҫӑкӑр śăk̬ăr sugers قرص gərṣ اغروم ˢaḡrum ⴰⵖⵔⵓⵎ 𒃻 superum < turpan 𓏏 𓏐 𓏳 𓏥

𒀜𒌅 at-tu to dig < 𓄞 𓂧 𓀜, 𓆷 𓂧 𓂡, 𓆷 𓄿 𓂧 𓁃 , 𓆷 𓄿 𓂧 𓂡
1. 𒁁𒁕𒀀𒄿 páddāi 파다 pada => part ⇔ Spaten
2. ᶴattu < 𓆷 𓄿 𓂧 𓂡 < 𓄞 𓂧 𓀜 < ขุด khùt cut
3. đào တူး tu conflicting variants resolved with ø

𓈎 unpeculiar 𓋴𓃀𓏘 šepíqa 𓃀 in sport shoe 𓋴 𓂝 𓈎 𓂻 send
